yaml.title: Benjamin W. Tjepkes, BSc.
yaml.subtitle: Integrating Ecological and Geospatial Science for Conservation
yaml.abstract: Welcome to the portfolio of Benjamin Tjepkes, an experienced wildlife ecologist and studying geographer. This site provides an overview of my professional experience and a showcase of my technical writings and visualizations.
yaml.description-meta: This is the porfolio and professional website of Benjamin Tjepkes.
